directions: Heat oil in heavy large pot over medium heat. Add leek and fennel seeds and sauté until leek is tender but not brown, about 5 minutes. Add potato, zucchini, corn, carrot and half of thyme. Stir 2 minutes. Add broth and wine; simmer until potato is tender, about 15 minutes. Add salmon and cream. Simmer until salmon is just opaque in center, about 5 minutes. Season chowder to taste with salt and pepper.
Ladle chowder into deep bowls. Sprinkle with remaining thyme.
ingredients: 1 leek (white and pale green parts only), sliced
2 tablespoons chopped fresh thyme or 2 teaspoons dried
1 pound skinless salmon fillet, cut into 3/4-inch pieces
title: Salmon and Vegetable Chowder
